languages.text: {n}Гордо вздернув подбородок, юноша окидывает взором строгое убранство дворца — оружие, священные стяги и славные трофеи. Кажется, сбывается какое-то из его юношеских мечтаний.{/n} "Для меня честь служить вам, Ваша Светлость! Клянусь пред Императором, что не подведу!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Гордо вздернув подбородок, юноша окидывает взором строгое убранство дворца — оружие, священные стяги и славные трофеи. Кажется, сбывается какое-то из его юношеских мечтаний.{/n} "Для меня честь служить вам, Ваша милость! Клянусь пред Императором, что не подведу!"

languages.text: {n}Sauerback raises his chin proudly and glances at the austere decorations in the palace — the weapons, the sacred banners, and the glorious trophies. By the looks of it, some youthful dream of his is coming true.{/n} "It is an honour for me to serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I swear it before the Emperor, I won't let you down!"
languages.original_text: {n}Гордо вздернув подбородок, юноша окидывает взором строгое убранство дворца — оружие, священные стяги и славные трофеи. Кажется, сбывается какое-то из его юношеских мечтаний.{/n} "Для меня честь служить вам, Ваша Светлость! Клянусь пред Императором, что не подведу!"

{n}Sauerback raises his chin proudly and glances at the austere decorations in the palace — the weapons, the sacred banners, and the glorious trophies. By the looks of it, some youthful dream of his is coming true.{/n} "It is an honour for me to serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I swear it before the Emperor, I won't let you down!"

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックは誇らしげにあごを上げて宮殿の質素な装飾、武器、神聖なバナー、そして輝かしい戦利品の数々を見つめる。その様子は、若かりしころの夢が実現したように見える。{/n}「お仕えできて光栄です、陛下！皇帝に誓って、陛下を失望させることはありません！」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback raises his chin proudly and glances at the austere decorations in the palace — the weapons, the sacred banners, and the glorious trophies. By the looks of it, some youthful dream of his is coming true.{/n} "It is an honour for me to serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I swear it before the Emperor, I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックは誇らしげにあごを上げて宮殿の質素な装飾、武器、神聖なバナー、そして輝かしい戦利品の数々を見つめる。その様子は、若かりしころの夢が実現したように見える。{/n}「お仕えできて光栄です、陛下！皇帝に誓って、陛下を失望させることはありません！」

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克骄傲地扬起下巴，瞥了一眼宫殿里那些充满威严的装饰品：各种各样的武器、神圣的旗帜，与辉煌的战利品。从他的表情来看，他年轻时的梦想就要实现了。{/n}“能为您效劳是我的荣幸，大人！我向帝皇发誓，一定不会让您失望！”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback raises his chin proudly and glances at the austere decorations in the palace — the weapons, the sacred banners, and the glorious trophies. By the looks of it, some youthful dream of his is coming true.{/n} "It is an honour for me to serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I swear it before the Emperor, I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克骄傲地扬起下巴，瞥了一眼宫殿里那些充满威严的装饰品：各种各样的武器、神圣的旗帜，与辉煌的战利品。从他的表情来看，他年轻时的梦想就要实现了。{/n}“能为您效劳是我的荣幸，大人！我向帝皇发誓，一定不会让您失望！”

languages.text: {n}Sauerback levanta orgulloso la barbilla y mira las austeras decoraciones del palacio: las armas, los estandartes sagrados y los gloriosos trofeos. Por su expresión, un sueño de juventud acaba de hacerse realidad.{/n} «¡Será un honor servirle, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Lo juro por el Emperador, no le decepcionaré!».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback raises his chin proudly and glances at the austere decorations in the palace — the weapons, the sacred banners, and the glorious trophies. By the looks of it, some youthful dream of his is coming true.{/n} "It is an honour for me to serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I swear it before the Emperor, I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback levanta orgulloso la barbilla y mira las austeras decoraciones del palacio: las armas, los estandartes sagrados y los gloriosos trofeos. Por su expresión, un sueño de juventud acaba de hacerse realidad.{/n} «¡Será un honor servirle, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Lo juro por el Emperador, no le decepcionaré!».

languages.text: {n}Sauerback lève fièrement le menton en jetant un coup d'œil à la décoration austère du palais, faite d'armes, de bannières sacrées et de trophées plus glorieux les uns que les autres. Vu son attitude, vous venez de réaliser son rêve de jeunesse.{/n} « C'est un honneur de vous servir, Votre Seigneurie ! Je ne vous décevrai pas, que l'Empereur m'en soit témoin ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback raises his chin proudly and glances at the austere decorations in the palace — the weapons, the sacred banners, and the glorious trophies. By the looks of it, some youthful dream of his is coming true.{/n} "It is an honour for me to serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I swear it before the Emperor, I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback lève fièrement le menton en jetant un coup d'œil à la décoration austère du palais, faite d'armes, de bannières sacrées et de trophées plus glorieux les uns que les autres. Vu son attitude, vous venez de réaliser son rêve de jeunesse.{/n} « C'est un honneur de vous servir, Votre Seigneurie ! Je ne vous décevrai pas, que l'Empereur m'en soit témoin ! »

languages.text: {n}Sauerback reckt stolz sein Kinn nach vorne und betrachtet die schlichten Dekorationen im Palast – Waffen, heilige Banner und ruhmreiche Trophäen. So wie es aussieht, geht gerade sein Jugendtraum in Erfüllung.{/n} "Es ist mir eine Ehre, Euch zu dienen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich schwöre beim Imperator, ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback raises his chin proudly and glances at the austere decorations in the palace — the weapons, the sacred banners, and the glorious trophies. By the looks of it, some youthful dream of his is coming true.{/n} "It is an honour for me to serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I swear it before the Emperor, I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback reckt stolz sein Kinn nach vorne und betrachtet die schlichten Dekorationen im Palast – Waffen, heilige Banner und ruhmreiche Trophäen. So wie es aussieht, geht gerade sein Jugendtraum in Erfüllung.{/n} "Es ist mir eine Ehre, Euch zu dienen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich schwöre beim Imperator, ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen!"

languages.text: {n}Sauerback iftiharla başını kaldırıp sarayın sade dekorasyonlarına göz atıyor: Silahlar, kutsal sancaklar ve görkemli ganimetler her yerde. Görünüşe bakılırsa gençlik hayali gerçekleşmek üzere.{/n} "Size hizmet etmek, benim için bir şereftir {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! İmparator şahidim olsun, sizi hayal kırıklığına uğratmayacağım!"
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback raises his chin proudly and glances at the austere decorations in the palace — the weapons, the sacred banners, and the glorious trophies. By the looks of it, some youthful dream of his is coming true.{/n} "It is an honour for me to serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I swear it before the Emperor, I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback iftiharla başını kaldırıp sarayın sade dekorasyonlarına göz atıyor: Silahlar, kutsal sancaklar ve görkemli ganimetler.
